net.javachallenge.api

Class MockPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.javachallenge.api.ComputerPlayer
      • net.javachallenge.api.MockPlayer

  • public class MockPlayer
extends ComputerPlayer
    The MockPlayer class represents a dummy player controlled by the computer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MockPlayer()
      Constructs a MockPlayer with a dummy name.
      MockPlayer(java.lang.String name)
      Constructs a MockPlayer with the given name.

      • selectVein

        public TrianglePoint selectVein(Game game)
        Description copied from class: ComputerPlayer
        Returns the selected vein location to occupy first. This method should terminate within 10000[ms]. The saved temporal vein location is used when this method exceed the limiting time. Note that the vein location are selected irresponsibly when an invalid vein location is selected.
        Specified by:
        selectVein in class ComputerPlayer
        Parameters:
        game - the Game instance of the current turn
        Returns:
        the selected vein location to occupy first

      • selectActions

        public java.util.List<Command> selectActions(Game game)
        Description copied from class: ComputerPlayer
        Returns the decided command list to control your player. This method should terminate within 10000[ms]. The saved temporal command list is used when this method exceed the limiting time. Note that the command to do nothing is accepted when an invalid or empty command is decided. Invalid commands are ignored, i.e. skipped to execute next commands in the command list.
        Specified by:
        selectActions in class ComputerPlayer
        Parameters:
        game - the Game instance of the current turn
        Returns:
        the decided command list to control your player
